bangudesc:
la sutysisku is a fast dictionary with examples for Lojban language. It is also used in 'The Crash Course in Lojban' textbook.

- Can I use it if I lose internet access?
- Yes, if this happens try opening this very address from this browser.
It should still open. A latest version of Chrome, Safari or Firefox is required.
For more resources visit Lojban Wiki.

Add as a search engine
title: Lojban with example phrases - la sutysisku
siskudescr: Search Dictionary with Examples used in 'The Crash Course in Lojban'.
opdescr: A dictionary for Lojban language (with examples), English and other languages. Also works offline.
